input.sentences: i went on a nature trail with my friends this morning .
we had a great time walking there and checking out the views .
there was a fence blocking off private property nearby .
afterward the trail disappeared and we decided to head back .
output.sentences: It was a boring summer day, so we decided to god on an adventure.
After exploring all of the features of the park, we started acting like kids again by jumping on benches.
Then we saw something we will never forget.
We ran rushed through the trees, arms outstretched to keep from falling.
The five of us never wanted to talk about that day again.
